channel.title: Safe Zones And Danger Zones
channel.description: Well yeah i wanted to make ::clanwars But i dont know how to make a big area into a multi area and wild i am using deltascape client base.

item.title: Safe Zones And Danger Zones
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

it’s all under client.java yes, search multi eventually you’ll find it, as well i believe you’ll need to do an update for most spells or else they wont do anything when in that multi area.

Read full topic

item.title: Safe Zones And Danger Zones
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“Epic Ancient, post:4, topic:300313”][quote author=pk3r john link=topic=396598.msg2945525#msg2945525 date=1252192643]

i made a tut will give link when approved my mod

client.java is called client class
You’re 100 tuts won’t get approved because I bet they are all under 5 mins.

As for the question, I believe it would be in your client class somewhere. Try searching for “multiarea”, or narrow it down to “multi”.
[/quote]
3 Tuts I believe; Client Class isn’t something people usually mess with. You mean client.java? :P[/quote]

Read full topic
